column4: hello is there a way to set evolution to show emails by accounts, instead of showing all the emails in one inbox?
anyone here uses evolution?
I do
how do you set emails to show by accounts instead of showing it all in one inbox?
I only have one account, so never tried...
np just wondered cause its annoying having all accounts in one inbox
you reattach by running mocp. and yes you can use commands to control moc without it open.
thanx needed to make sure on the -h page i only found how to detach :p, what would be the standard command in terminal to play next song in moc?
mocp -f (play next song)
try mocp --help
im reading the man page and there is no explanation in running moc through terminal
what do you mean?
np just worked out how to do it wasnt thinking nvm
:) np
i wonder if wmii window option can do the same now that would be awesome (which apparently is also a tilling/panel wm smaller than wmii)
wmii do what?

sorry, i'm a bit lost as to what you are/were trying to do...

oh, you mean dmenu?
